name: eqeqan1dOLD
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wb(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c3, c1)))

stmt.origin: eqeqan12d(c2, c0, c3, c1, w0, wceq(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: eqeqan12d(c2, c0, c3, c1, w0, c0 = c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wb(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c3, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wb(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c3, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))

|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wb(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c3, c1)))

comment: Implication of introducing a new equality. Obsolete as of 14-Feb-2023. Use ~ eqeqan12d instead. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Apr-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Feb-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
